modName: Twin dragon and Ebony Warrior thrall
summary: Fight 2 dragons, a giant and a mammoth at once with 2 thralls(Ebony Warrior &  Orchendor), a follower and a dog in team.
descriptionHtml:
Move a few steps ahead to fight against two dragons a giant and a mammoth at once.
Two thralls (Ebony Warrior and Orchendor) a follower, a dog and a horse in team.

Had just converted ebony warrior to thrall and spawned here to test him out, only to find two more dragons.
author: makx
